articles.description: A sequel to 2017’s Horizon Zero Dawn is in development on PlayStation 5 at Guerrilla Games, publisher Sony Interactive Entertainment announced during its “Future of Gaming” PS5 showcase. The release date is set for 2021.
articles.content: Aloy returns to save Earth in Horizon Zero Dawns sequel

articles.author: Brett Wadelton
articles.title: Huawei’s P40 Pro is the world’s best smartphone camera – and this is why - 7NEWS.com.au
articles.description: When it comes to smartphone photography, huge improvements have been made in the last few years, but one company leads the pack.
articles.content:

articles.title: Horizon Forbidden West Heading To PS5 In 2021 - Kotaku Australia
articles.description: Horizon Forbidden West will launch on PlayStation 5 in 2021, according to an announcement made today by game director Mathijs de Jonge. “With the additional power of the PlayStation 5, we can make the world even more detailed, more vibrant, and more immersive…
articles.content:
